desc.p: The valid ID is SYSTEM . The table contains the transaction codes and the PL that needs to be adjusted using that transaction code
The field forms an associated multi-value with the field TXN.CODE. This field indicates the PL to be adjusted using the given transaction codes.
The currently allowed values are INCOME and FEES.

The field is a sub-value and forms an associated Multi-value with the field PL.CATEG. The field indicates the list of transactions that are used for adjusting the PL with which it is associated. The field can contain any valid TRANSACTION or SC.TRANS.TYPE ids.
